title: Scotch 5" Soft Touch Blunt Tip Kids Scissors, 12 Count Teacher’s Pack, Green, All-Purpose Scissors for School and Crafts (1442P-12)
description: Scotch 5” Soft Touch Blunt Tip Kids Scissors feature a soft grip handle made for small, growing hands. Designed for safe right and left-handed use for all kids. Scotch Kids Scissors cut precisely, making them great for a variety of kid-friendly school projects– they are a must-have on your school supplies list for back-to-school. Easy to use at home for enriching supervised activities and crafts. Safe for the classroom, Scotch Kids Scissors feature quality stainless steel blades with a sharp edge, blunt tip, and long cutting life. Cuts through paper, card stock, tape, foam, pictures and more. The best projects start with Scotch Brand Scissors.
